Price: $29.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:46:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations string lights

Christmas Decorations

【Safe and Easy to Use】LED Waterfall Lights output voltage is 29V with UL Certified to ensure safety use. and this outdoor christmas decorations clearance is safe to touch and will keep at a low-temperature state after lighting up for hours. It’s very safe, power-saving, and environmentally friendly.
【8 Lights Modes & IP44 Waterproof】The fairy lights have 8 different light patterns: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. IP44 waterproof is perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.
【Ideal Gift & Decoration Choice】 This christmas decorations outdoor yard lights can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Widely use to hanging Christmas tree outdoor, Yards, porches, patio, garden, wall, window, bedroom, living room, wedding, party, birthday, Christmas etc.
【Timer Function & Friendly Service】Built-in timer function, Press the timer button and the indicator light on the controller will light up, which means the lights will automatically light up for 6 hours and turn off for 18 hours. We support 12 month free replacement and provide 24-hour online customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question.

Easy to Use

The christmas tree decorations lights have two control ways, which is the mode button of the plug and the remote control. You can adjust the brightness from 100%, 75%, 50%, 25%. According to your actual needs choose the comfortable brightness. It can create a romatic atmosphere for your life.

Low Voltage & UL Certification

This Christmas lights use 29V safety low voltage , which strictly tested and meets the US requirements of string lights UL safety standards, More safety and less power consumption. No danger of electric shock, lower than standard body safe voltage 36V.

Outdoor Waterproof Designed

The high waterproof rating and strong construction is durable enough to stand complex climates, ideal for home decor, holiday outdoor decorations, garden decor for outside, new year decorations and can work normally even in cold winter.

Read more

5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:43:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments
Players 2 2 1 - 2 2 - 6 2 - 6
Play Time 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 30 - 90 min 30 - 90 min

item.title: 2 Pack Solar String Lights Outdoor, 200 LED Extra-Long 72FT Solar Powered Lights with 8 Lighting Modes, Waterproof Outdoor Lighting Decoration for Garden, Patio, Balcony, Xmas, Wedding, Party
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) [More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)



[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

4.5
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Super Large Projection Area】The upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft² with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:05 UTC – Details)



【Super Large Projection Area】The upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft² with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on the brightness of the environment
【Waterproof Design & Weather Resistance】The snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25°C- 32°C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
【Easy to set up & Adjustable】 It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360°shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want
【Xmas Gift Idea & Xmas Decoration】The Christmas projector outdoor can be given as a special gift to your family, or friends; also it is a great choice to add to the Christmas decoration, suits for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, family gathering, party, theme activity, garden landscape house, bedroom decorations

5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:05 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Merry and Bright

Swipe left to learn more

Committed to creating a comfortable, cozy and festival ambiance for your outdoor & indoor space and life.

We are continually enhancing our product lines to bring you the newest technologies and features available in the marketplace.

We pays attention to not only colorful lighting but also your safety.

Enjoy Decorating Your Home

STRING LIGHTS

WINDOW LIGHTS

ICECICLE LIGHTS

HALLOWEEN LIGHTS

【More Comprehensive Functions】8 Lighting Modes Timer Memory8 options lighting modes make a playful addition to Christmas decor. Build in timer and memory, lights will auto on/off once set, don’t need to operate it manually. Saves your last lighting choice, which is more user friendly!
【Safer and Energy Efficient】High Efficient LED lights will save you money on energy costs, they’ll last longer than incandescent lights and you don’t have to worry about them overheating. Features upgraded 29V low voltage ETL adapter allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, max 1222 LED 132ft, so you can extend to decorate a greater area easily.
【Superior Weather Resistance】Our led lights use high-quality PVC wire and built with IP44 Weatherproof-Tech so that they can withstand all weather for year-round enjoyment. Please note that the adapter is NOT waterproof, please kindly protect the power adapter from the water!
【Popular Choice & Widely Used】Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. White Christmas lights lend a timeless look, and they will give your home a whimsical, snow-covered appearance. More safer to kids and your family while Christmas party, family reunion, wedding party and BBQ outside.



Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.

Product Parameters

Light Color: Cool White
Wire color: Clear wire
Number of leds: 611 LED
Number of drop wire: 141 drops
Light Length: 66ft (20m)
Power lead length: 11.5ft (3.5m)

5.5-in spacing between drops, and staggered drop lengths of 23.6 in, 15.7 in and 11.8 in, provide the virtual icy look for your home.


WIDELY USED–The Christmas lights are easy to install on overhangs, awnings, roof edges, windows and other places on your home’s exterior or interior.

Dense evergreen trees, like pines, firs and spruces, may require more lights. By wrapping bushes and shrubs with this ice string lights, you’ll cover a greater area with fewer strands and less work.


Read more




UL LISTED AND QUALITY INSPECTION

Clear wire with 29V UL listed power adapter led string lights create a safe and secure holiday for you and your loved one.

WITH MEMORY FUNCTION

Built-in memory chip, Saves your last lighting mode without you having to remember to reset so every night, which is more user friendly!

END TO END CONNECTABLE

Features upgraded adapter led string lights allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, 66ft 611 LED per strand, max 1222 LED 132ft. So you can easily light a greater area.

It is suitable for decoration in many scenes, but also suitable as a gift for our family, friends, classmate, lovers and so on.

Christmas Star Waterfall String Lights – Indoor and Outdoor Decor

Outdoor waterfall star string lights will light up your Christmas and holidays! Comes with 16.4′ extension cord, upgraded 11″ Iron Top Star and 9 strands of 10′ long string lights. You can hang this meteor Christmas light on your roof or tree top. Perfect for decorating Christmas trees, backyards, porches, patios, gardens, walls, windows, bedrooms, living rooms, weddings and parties, etc. It is also an ideal gift for family and friends.

What makes us stand out
more durable material (won’t break)
Longer lasting (lasts at least 10 vacations)
Neat wires won’t get crimped or twisted
Energy saving (almost no power consumption)
Safer (UL listed, low voltage output, cool to the touch)
Suitable for indoor and outdoor (IP44 waterproof)
feature:

8 Lighting Modes: Combo, Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chase/Flash, Slow Fade, Blink/Flash and Always On

Christmas, Wedding, Engagement, New Year, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary, Birthday Party, Sweet Emotions and more

This is a set of weatherproof string lights designed for inclement weather and suitable for all seasons. But be aware that the plugs are not waterproof, you’ll need to do some protection or keep them out of the water.

Good choice for Christmas
【8 Lighting Modes】Christmas Waterfall Lights have 8 different light modes: Combination, Wave, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Blinking, Slow/Fader, Blinking/Blinking, Steady Lighting Like a beautiful star falling on you in front of. What’s even more amazing is that the stars can twinkle from the bottom up, and you can enjoy a meteor shower feast on Christmas!
【Powerful Memory Function】The Christmas waterfall light has a memory function. The built-in memory chip will save your last mode setting, no need to reset the mode every time, when you restart, the memory function will be restored from the previous setting mode. How convenient!
【EASY TO USE AND SAFE】Just hang the big star on the exterior wall, tree or eaves, then hang the 9 star string lights to the ground. Then we unfold each light wire and fix it to the ground. It’s that easy! The UL listed plug and low temperature LED bulb ensure it is safe to touch even after prolonged use. Save you time and effort. Safer to use!
【Waterfall light for multiple scenes】: Waterfall light is IP44 outdoor waterproof design, it can work normally even in cold winter. This large LED outdoor Christmas decoration can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Perfect for Christmas decorations, Thanksgiving, Weddings, Valentine’s Day and more. This is the most classic style, illuminates eaves, trees, walls, decks, balconies, Christmas trees to create a charming atmosphere.
【No Risk Investment】Our products will surely attract your love after continuous improvement. If you have any questions, you can contact us by email. We will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours. If you don’t think your investment today is worth a penny, we’ll give you a full refund.

From the brand

Lighting has been deeply rooted in the soul of human . In the unity of function and form，lamps not only become masters of creating atmosphere, but also add artistic tone to the space.

EXF has always been endeavoring in the combination of bright and art.

“EXTRA FUN AND BEAUTY for your home decoration” is our design concept and goal. We hope your life will be accompanied by us all the time.

C9 Christmas lights

Solar string lights

Meteor shower lights

Christmas String Lights

【Widely Used Solar Lights Outdoor】: This starbright solar LED string lights is a great choice for Christmas, Wedding, Patio, Garden, Yard, Party, Fence, Porch, Xmas Tree, Roof and so on.
【Energy-Saving & High Efficiency】: This outdoor string lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility of electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. It can work up to 8~10 hours at night after fully charged under sunshine for 6~8 hours.
【8 Modes & Memory Function】: These solar mini lights have the ON/OFF button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button. And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it.
*NOTES*: 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged and light on automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location – not in a shady area – and the solar panel faces the sun. 3. If any question about order or product, please contact seller and we will respond in 24 hours.

Read more

EXF warm white solar Christmas lights are perfect for your celebrations outdoors or around your front yard, bring warmth to your home!

An Ideal decor for our outdoor living

With 2022 upgraded solar panel, the outdoor string lights will provide you a better experience of outdoor living. It is an ideal decor for the Christmas trees and fence and more.

Energy Saving & IP65 Waterproof

The solar LED string lights are powered by solar energy, this light will lights up automatically at night and off during the day, no utility energy costs. With its IP65 water resistance performance, it can work as usual even in rainy days when there is still power with the battery, no need to worry about short circuit due to moisture.

8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function

Our solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof have memory function and it will remember the last light setting mode and no need to press the ON/OFF button every day. You can press the button on the solar panel to select any lighting mode you like.

Read more

8 Brilliant Lighting Modes:

  • Combination
  • Waves
  • Sequential
  • Slow glow
  • Chasing/flash
  • Slow fade
  • Twinkle/flash
  • Steady-on

Specifications:

  • LED Color: Warm White
  • LED quantity: 100 LED * 4 = 400 LEDs
  • Switch: ON/OFF, MODE (8 Modes)
  • Charging time: 6-8 hours & Working time: 8 -10 hours
  • String light Length: 33ft * 4 =132ft
  • Wire Length to first LED: 1.5m/4.9ft
  • Space Between LEDs: 10cm/0.32ft
  • Battery: 800MAH Ni-MH rechargeable battery

Read more

HOW to use it?

  • Assemble the lights according to the IM;
  • Remove the protective clear film on the solar panel;
  • Cover the solar panel entirely and press the ON/OFF button, ensure it is at ON mode, then press MODE button to select your favorite lighting mode;
  • Find a place you would like to decorate, make sure the solar panel can be exposed to efficient direct sunshine, meanwhile, this place will not have bright light source at night;
  • Softten the earth with water and insert the ground spike into the earth;
  • Adjust the solar panel and make it face upwardly, tighten the screw, it will turn on at night and turn off at dawn automatically.

WHY it doesn’t work?

  • Please place the solar panel under direct sunshine to charge for one or 2 days and it should be able to turn on as usual.
  • Check the solar panel is ON, cover the complete solar panel. If the lights come on, the button is in the on position.
  • If the sun is not enough weather, or the temperature of the cold season, please charge more than a few days.

Any questions please feel freely to ask us, we will help you solve problem quickly.

4.5

[Timer Function]: Comes with built-in auto timer function(6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights. Just turn on the lights (any lighting mode) at 6 p.m. in the evening, and it will turn off at 12 a.m. at midnight, then auto on at 6 p.m. in the evening, this cycle repeats itself ad infinitum, no need to reset it everyday
[Durable & Safe Green Wire String Lights]: Keep at a low temperature state after lighting up for hours, ensure and maximize the safety. 3 AA Batteries operated, not include batteries. No extra cord or socket required, for safe and convenient use. Battery box to the first LED light: 1ft. Total length(lights string and leading line): 17ft
[IP 44 Waterproof]: The strong construction makes the string lights tough and sturdy, and waterproof designed string lights perfect for Christmas indoor outdoor decorations. The battery case is waterproof IP44, so it can meet normal use outside but not enough to put under water directly
[Great Outdoor Decorations]: Perfect for indoor and outdoor use, like home, bar, garden, patio, balcony, or wherever decorative light is needed. Ideal for Christmas party, Halloween, Valentine’s day, wedding, Home, Window, Bathroom, Thanksgiving day, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building decorations

WATERGLIDE 50 LED Outdoor Christmas Lights, Battery Operated Mini String Lights with 8 Lighting Modes & Timer

Decorate with our 16ft Christmas decorative mini string lights with 50 warm white individual LED bulbs, will give a soft festive feel to your Xmas.

Notes:

1. Do not mix old and new batteries.

2. Do not mix different types of batteries.

3. If you do not use, please remove the batteries before storage.

Specifications:

Light Color: Warm White

LED Count: 50 pcs Each

Total Length (end to end): 17FT Each

String lights: 16FT Each

Waterproof Level: IP44

Power Supply: Battery Powered

Timer: 6 hours on and 18 hours off

Each string is full wave rectified, which eliminates any flickering making these LED Christmas lights bright.

High bright and luminous intensity, good heat dissipation, low light decay, and create romantic life for you.

8 lighting modes for you to choose – Combination, In waves, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. Comes with built-in auto timer function without setting (6 hrs ON, 18 hrs OFF), to avoid forgetting to turn off the Christmas lights.

Perfect eye-catching accent for your indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations for your garden, pathway, lawn, yard, flowerbed, fence, walkway or anywhere you want, they will create a warm Christmas feel to your space.
